lead_paragraph: BARNETT--John M.,passed away on Friday, January 29, 2016. He was 74. Funeral services will be conducted on Monday, February 1, 2016 at Temple Sinai, 208 Summit Ave., Summit, NJ with Interment following at Beth Israel Cemetery, Cedar Knolls, NJ. He was a Vice President for Springs Mills at its headquarters in New York City for almost 25 years. He was also a fine artist. He is survived by his wife, Diane Barnett, a daughter Jennifer (Eric) Hedrick, a son Zachary Barnett and his partner Darrin Banks, along with grandchildren Abby, Nate and Finn. Services are being handled by Ross' Shalom Chapels, 49 Whippany Road, Whippany, NJ. For more information visit: www.rosschapels.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARNETT, JOHN M.
